content.bodyText: You find yourself in a strange iridescent sphere, floating in what appears to be endless space. Around you, other bubbles of various sizes shimmer with different realities. Where do you want to go?

rows.title: Bubble Nebula
rows.description: A vast cosmic bubble formed by stellar winds

rows.title: Economic Bubble
rows.description: A world of inflated digital assets and crypto dreams

rows.title: Soap Bubble
rows.description: A fragile world of rainbow reflections
